com.jumio.bam.custom

Interface BamCustomScanInterface


  • public interface BamCustomScanInterface
    Interface for status updates from the Bam custom scanning view

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBamCameraAvailable()
      Camera is available - It should be checked if the camera has a flash here

      An error occured
      void onBamExtractionFinished(BamCardInformation bamCardInformation, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scanAttempts)
      This method is called when extraction has finished
      void onBamExtractionStarted()
      This method is called when a card is detected and extraction starts running

    • Method Detail

      • onBamCameraAvailable

        void onBamCameraAvailable()
        Camera is available - It should be checked if the camera has a flash here

      • onBamError

        void onBamError(java.lang.String errorCode,
                java.lang.String errorMessage,
                boolean retryPossible,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scanAttempts)
        An error occured
        Parameters:
        errorCode -
        errorMessage -
        retryPossible - - true if a retry is possible. false if a retry would result in the same error
        scanAttempts - - list of scan references

      • onBamExtractionStarted

        void onBamExtractionStarted()
        This method is called when a card is detected and extraction starts running

      • onBamExtractionFinished

                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scanAttempts)
        This method is called when extraction has finished
        Parameters:
        bamCardInformation - - BamCardInformation object
        scanAttempts - - list of scan references
